person.content:
Please identify the "Person" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: NYMEX gasoline for January delivery climbed 0.12 cents a gallon to 69.80 cents as a light 33 lots traded in the nearby month and 35 moved overall .

Let's think step by step.

| Person |
| --- |
| NYMEX |

The paragraph is primarily about the price movement of a commodity (gasoline) on NYMEX (New York Mercantile Exchange), so the only identifiable person entity mentioned in the paragraph is NYMEX.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Person" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Person".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Person |
| --- |
| NYMEX |

The paragraph mentions "NYMEX" which is a clear reference to a person, specifically the New York Mercantile Exchange. Other entities mentioned in the paragraph, such as "gallon," "cents," "January delivery," "33 lots," and "35 moved overall," do not refer to persons.
